title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the project requirements, including the chatbot's functionality, security features, integration with existing systems, user personas, expected usage scenarios, data privacy and compliance considerations, and performance and scalability requirements.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture for the SecurityChatbot, including the chatbot's components, data flow, security mechanisms, and integration with existing systems. Consider scalability, maintainability, performance requirements, and high availability. Ensure compliance with relevant security standards and regulations.
dependencies: Identify Security Requirements and Compliance Standards

title: Develop Chatbot Frontend
description: Implement the chatbot's user interface, including the chat window, input/output handling, and user authentication.

title: Develop Chatbot Backend
description: Implement the chatbot's backend logic, including natural language processing, security advice generation, and integration with external systems.

title: Implement Security Mechanisms
description: Develop and integrate security features, such as user authentication, data encryption, and secure communication channels.

title: Set up Database and Data Storage
description: Design and implement the database schema and data storage solutions for storing and retrieving security advice, user data, and chat logs.

title: Develop Testing Strategy and Test Cases
description: Create a comprehensive testing strategy and develop test cases to ensure the chatbot's functionality, security, and performance.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a CI/CD pipeline for automated building, testing, and deployment of the chatbot application.

title: Write User Documentation
description: Create user guides, FAQs, and other documentation to assist employees in using the chatbot effectively.
